      Methods in com.att.research.xacml.api that return StatusCode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StatusCode StatusCode.getChild()
      Gets a child StatusCode of this StatusCode if there is one.
      StatusCode Status.getStatusCode()
      Gets the StatusCode for this Status.

    • Uses of StatusCode in com.att.research.xacml.std

      Classes in com.att.research.xacml.std that implement StatusCode 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StdStatusCode
      Immutable implementation of the StatusCode interface to store the major and minor com.att.research.xacml.common.StatusCodeValues objects associated with a XACML StatusCode element.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static StdStatusCode StdStatusCode.copy(StatusCode statusCode)
      Creates a new StdStatusCode that is a copy of the given StatusCode.
      void StdMutableStatus.setStatusCode(StatusCode statusCodeIn)
      Sets the StatusCode representing the XACML StatusCode for the Status represented by this StdMutableStatus.

      Creates a new StdStatus with the given StatusCode, String status message, and StatusDetail.
      StdStatusCode(Identifier statusCodeValueIn, StatusCode childIn)
      Creates a new StdStatusCode with the given Identifier representing the XACML StatusCode value, and the given StatusCode representing the sub-StatusCode.

    • Uses of StatusCode in com.att.research.xacml.std.dom

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static StatusCode DOMStatusCode.newInstance(org.w3c.dom.Node nodeStatusCode)
      Creates a new DOMStatusCode by parsing the given Node representing a XACML StatusCode element.

    • Uses of StatusCode in com.att.research.xacml.std.jaxp

      Classes in com.att.research.xacml.std.jaxp that implement StatusCode 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JaxpStatusCode
      JaxpStatusCode extends StdStatusCode with static methods for creating a StatusCode object by parsing JAXP elements based on the XACML 3.0 schema.
